metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19107 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
In Exiv2 0.26, Exiv2::IptcParser::decode in iptc.cpp (called from psdimage.cpp in the PSD image reader) may suffer from a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read) caused by an integer overflow via a crafted PSD image file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19107` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

exiv2 - 0.25-2.1ubuntu16.04.4
libexiv2-14 - 0.25-2.1ubuntu16.04.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: exiv2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.25-2.1ubuntu16.04.4').
